tips: This extension is completely open source. Take a look at the repository on GitHub!
If you notice that something's wrong, please open an issue on GitHub!
If you don't like the theme, disable it and the other the features will still work!
Open links in new tabs makes links in comments open up in new tabs as well!
You can pause infinite scrolling by clicking on "pause infinite scrolling", next to "More"!
Accurate domain names shows you more precisely where a link takes (e.g., github.com becomes gist.github.com)!
You can try High contrast if you have issues reading some of the text on the site.
Highlight links when returning will help you find which link you came from when coming back to Hacker News!
Fold comments adds a button to comments that lets you expand or collapse them as you read!
